IntelStmDeviceGeometry Struct Reference

Detailed Description

The following structure specifies the geometry of the Intel/STM Serial Flash.


Data Fields

u8 ManufacturerID
u16 DeviceCode
u16 BytesPerPage
u16 PagesPerSector
u16 NumOfSectors
